EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Apache Geode (incubating) Clubhouse #2 - Secret Sauce for Network Partition-Tolerance in Apache Geode
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Apache Geode (incubating) Clubhouse #2 - Secret Sauce for Network Partition-Tolerance in Apache Geode. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details:
Date: Thursday, June 25, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}} Time: 9:00AM PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e9f171251f9fee71080ee095f1fc9fb48> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 669 222 002 Thank you,
